product.title: Affinity Saffron Roller Blind
product.description: A lovely, textured mix of neutrals and greys, the affinity saffron roller blind has a natural appeal. The colourway is light and neutral, with plenty of depth to bring a homely feel to surroundings, while the comforting finish creates an inviting and relaxing atmosphere in y a lovely, textured mix of neutrals and greys, the affinity saffron roller blind has a natural appeal.

relproducts.title: Affinity Plaster - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The affinity blind in plaster offers a fresh take on cream, infused with just a hint of buttery yellow to give this blind a richer tone without being overpowering or overtly gold. The affinity patterning adds that touch of chic class that you have been looking for. The subtle glowing quality of the affinity plaster make this blind an ideal addition to a decadent yet tasteful bedroom or living room, where it couples well with traditional wooden features.

relproducts.title: Affinity Storm - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The lightweight, easy-to-use affinity storm is comprised of a dark grey backdrop fabric covered with a high quality, stitched pattern that reduces the light coming in from outdoors without having the full influence of a blackout blind. The way that the pattern is stitched allows the affinity storm to gently shine, giving it a modern and chic quality. Try contrasting with dark blues or purples in the living room to provide a rich, opulent colour scheme, or use the affinity patterning to provide character in a much more colour-neutral hallway or landing.

relproducts.title: Affinity Silver - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The affinity in silver combines the distinctive affinity patterning with a barely-there silver fabric to provide a truly stunning interaction between room light and blind, making an ethereal addition to any home. This pretty fabric keeps out enough of the outside world to offer privacy, yet won't totally blackout a room. Couple the affinity silver with a dark navy for a moody yet beautiful bedroom colour scheme, or add a hint of sophistication to a monochrome dining room.

relproducts.title: Affinity Pure - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The affinity pure takes a lightweight, easy-hanging white fabric with a subtle hint of cream, and uses it to host a pure white, modern pattern. The contrast between the stitching and fabric adds interest to an otherwise neutral blind. Use the affinity pure as part of a fresh, neutral colour scheme in a living room or home office. Or make a real feature of it, by setting it amongst brightly painted walls to make it really stand out in a colourful bedroom or playroom.

relproducts.title: Affinity Touch - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: If you're looking for an off-white, patterned blind that oozes class and sophistication, then the affinity touch could be the one you've been looking for. The beautifully lightweight fabric displays the carefully stitiched, signature affinity pattern to give the touch an elegant, tasteful feel. The affinity touch will complement bolder colours well, particularly deep browns, rich purples, and shimmering golds, making it the ideal addition to living rooms and dining rooms, whether contemporary or traditional.

relproducts.title: Affinity Black - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The affinity blind in black is a lightly patterned fabric that offers great protection from the outside light, whilst still providing style and elegance. The easy-to-use roller-blind is durable, lightweight, and high quality; everything one looks for in a home blind. The delicate patterning of the affinity black looks can add interest to monochrome dcor schemes, where blacks, greys, and whites win the day.

relproducts.title: Affinity Touch - Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: The affinity touch is close to pure white, but without the stark brightness, and has a pretty scattered patterning over the top. This simple and attractive blind is made from an enduring, textured fabric, and offers effective light-filtering properties to allow the light in whilst offering privacy. Use in the bedroom for a romantic, wistful feel, without compromising on contemporary design. Surround with dusky pinks or muted greens for country, summery look all year round, and accessorise with brushed golds and cast iron furniture.

relproducts.title: Affinity Silver - Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Affinity's silver combines a shimmering fabric background with raised, pretty patterning to craft a pretty yet unobtrusive filter blind. A robust vertical blind, the neatly hanging louvres will work effortlessly open and close on demand. The silver can sit as a soft window feature against white walls and light woods to create a modern take on traditional styling in a living room or bedroom. Or use it with dark greys and silver accessories for a cool, one-of-a-kind look in your bathroom or hallway.

relproducts.title: Affinity Storm - Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: The muted grey of the affinity storm is offset by the raised stitched pattern that covers the blind from head to toe. This pretty blind does little to give away the resilience of its high quality fabric, yet it is nonetheless durable and long-lasting. The storm would suit a fresh, contemporary dining room, in combination with white walls and glass furniture, and would work brilliantly as an attractive window feature in an otherwise plain downstairs cloakroom, hallway, or utility room.

relproducts.title: Affinity Pure - Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: The leaf-like patterning of the affinity pure will light up a room's dcor and you'll be sure to notice it catching the light. This blind blends class with functionality, as its cutting edge filter fabric and no-fuss louvres make this a usable and durable window covering. Go cool and fresh in the kitchen by setting the pure against sky blue walls and light, natural woods. This blind would also make a pretty addition to a guest or master bedroom, where tranquillity and calm rule the roost.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: A highly popular range, loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their stockholmfabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This grey roller blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories. This roller blind with accompanying white components and grey fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Cream Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm cream is a beautiful neutral colour, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder & great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm cream roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Frost Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholmfrost is an attractive, clean and crisp white colour. It will freshen up any space within the home or office. Stockholm frost fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords making them inherently child safe. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee giving extra peace of mind when investing in this product.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Rock Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their moisture-resistant, stockholm rock roller blind is a stunning mid grey hue. It's a modern, on trend colour choice & will be a perfect finishing touch for your window. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including the option of a rust free chain so you can get just the perfect finishing touches for your window. This blind also comes with 5 year guarantee as standard, giving you peace of mind that you blind is built to last.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Mid Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm mid grey roller blinds are a beautiful contemporary cool grey colour. A timeless grey colour that will compliment most color palettes within the home or office. Their roller blinds can be manufactured with smooth control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your space. Also, their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee providing additional peace of mind when investing in this product.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Snow White Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm snow is a beautiful fresh white colour, it will work perfectly in most spaces. A real all rounder & great for brightening up any room. Stockholm snow fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind. Product id: db-prbx0082 fabric colour: snow material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes stockholm snow white roller blind in white.

relproducts.title: Valencia French Cream Roller Blind
relproducts.description: This valencia roller blind is light cream; think of an extremely milky coffee. Some might say buff or ecru, whatever you call it, it's a very nice neutral shade that adds just enough colour to the window. This colourway is beautiful in both modern settings and homes that favour this valencia roller blind is light cream; think of an extremely milky coffee.

relproducts.title: Valencia Spring Green Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Fresh and fruity, this valencia spring green roller blind will give your home a bright burst of colour. Combine this blind with more earthy tones to give your room a bold and funky accent or use it to create a vibrant and vivid interior with other striking colours.

relproducts.title: Valencia Sangria Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The valencia sangria roller blind is warm red in colour. Clearly this blind has a vibrant tone but its also a sophisticated choice that will add richness to a scheme. This juicy colour will be a wonderful accent to a room of soft browns and neutral or maybe lighter whites or the valencia sangria roller blind is warm red in colour.

relproducts.title: Valencia Orange Embers Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Choose their striking orange roller blind to add a stunning splash of colour. Its as bright as bright can be. This blind will add a funky zing to any interior; think family rooms, breakfast rooms, rooms featuring strong blocks of colour as well as childrens bedrooms.

relproducts.title: Affinity Azurite Roller Blind
relproducts.description: If youre looking to add texture to your home, then this is the way to do it. The snug texture effect of the affinity azurite roman blind from the harlequin additions range adds warmth and a cosy feel in an instant, while the calming blue palette brings tranquillity. Cool an if youre looking to add texture to your home, then this is the way to do it.

relproducts.title: Affinity Sandstone Roller Blind
relproducts.description: With its lovely, natural colour palette, the affinity sandstone roller blind brings all the warmth your home needs. The woven design is picked out in sandy tones, with hints of cool grey adding interesting texture and character to the delightful design. From the harlequin add with its lovely, natural colour palette, the affinity sandstone roller blind brings all the warmth your home needs.
